item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name’s Sergey. I’m a software technical writer with 8 years of experience. Since 2015, I’ve worked as a solo writer at engineering-driven logistics companies in Southeast Asia, where I focused on internal-facing documentation and processes, as well as external-facing content. As a lone writer, part of my job is to maintain a corporate knowledge base, and this is where I put on the hat of an information architect.
